name: Personalia
description:
Personalia is a platform-style arcade game made with Unity that propels players into the world of Cinderelly, a cyborg pop-star who is on the hunt to destroy the record executives who stole her music from her. 

Collect the green sprites. These are paparazzi and will improve your health points. But, watch out and avoid the record company executive. He'll deplete your health before you can collect the white records.
